document.full_text: the harvard women's health study found that women who ate a diet rich in omega-3 fatty acids found in fish were at significantly lower risk of developing macular degeneration.
document.title: vital signs: diet: eating fish found to ward off eye disease
lines_and_colors: the harvard women's health study found that women who ate a diet rich in omega-3 fatty acids found in fish were at significantly lower risk of developing macular degeneration.
